revised_title: Technologies for Improving Nutritional Status in Rural Communities
tldr: The article discusses the importance of a detailed quantitative assessment of a community's dietary and nutritional status before planning intervention programs. It explores various methods for measuring dietary intake and assessing nutritional health, emphasizing the close relationship between nutrient intake and infection patterns. The author provides specific examples from studies in Uganda and The Gambia and reviews the integration of health data into the formulation of preventive nutritional programs.
scientific_discipline: Health Sciences > Nutrition and Public Health
